smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function bind has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function toAnalyticsBundle appears to be too complex.
The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onActivityCreated appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function toIconTitlePair appears to be too complex.
The function toValues appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.
The function upload appears to be too complex.

smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function addGeoJsonLayer is nested too deeply.
Function upload is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: File 'View.kt' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
File 'Transition.kt' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'

smells.name: EmptyCatchBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.
This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: EmptyDefaultConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: An empty default constructor can be removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: EnumNaming
smells.description: Enum names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Enum entry names should match the pattern: ^[A-Z][_a-zA-Z0-9]*
Enum entry names should match the pattern: ^[A-Z][_a-zA-Z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'Families.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ApiFamilies'.
The file name 'GeoJson.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'PlaceGeoJson'.
The file name 'Check.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'ViewValidateDsl'.
The file name 'TextView.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'TextWatcherDsl'.

smells.name: TopLevelPropertyNaming
smells.description: Top level property names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Top level constant names should match the pattern: [A-Z][_A-Z0-9]*
Top level constant names should match the pattern: [A-Z][_A-Z0-9]*
Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMinLength
smells.description: Function names should not be shorter than the minimum defined in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at least 3 characters long.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: FunctionNaming
smells.description: Function names should follow the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should match the pattern: ^([a-z$][a-zA-Z$0-9]*)|(`.*`)$

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.
Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Value defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class GithubRelease defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class LoginBody defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class ActivateBody defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class GeoPreferences defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `this to second`

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: SECOND_IN_MILLS can be a `const val`.
REQUEST_TAKE_PHOTO can be a `const val`.
REQUEST_PICK_PHOTO can be a `const val`.
enterDuration can be a `const val`.
exitDuration can be a `const val`.
sharedElementDuration can be a `const val`.

smells.name: NestedClassesVisibility
smells.description: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality and therefore this should not be public.

instances.message: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of LoginOrgFragment makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of LoginUserFragment makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of HomeVisitFormFragment makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of PhotoAdapter makes it visible externally.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (holder.itemView as RelationshipView) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: holder.itemView as RelationshipView
Parentheses in (Uri.parse(url)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: Uri.parse(url)
Parentheses in (height + scrollY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: height + scrollY

smells.name: ProtectedMemberInFinalClass
smells.description: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

instances.message: Member with protected visibility in final class is private. Consider using private or internal as modifier.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private property TAG is unused.
Private property url_staging is unused.
Private property url_beta is unused.
